name: PhynDevice
0:
”Alexa, ask Phyn Device how much water I have used today”
”Alexa, ask Phyn Device to turn off my water”
”Alexa, ask Phyn Device what is my water status”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: phyn device
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Open the Skills and Games screen in the Alexa app, search and select the Phyn Device skill and press “Enable To Use”. The Alexa app will bring you to a page that will allow you to link your Alexa profile and your Phyn device.

To get insights into your water use from Alexa, say “Alexa, ask Phyn Device how much water I have used today.” or “Alexa, ask Phyn Device how much water I have used this month.”. For a general overview of your current alerts and water use, say “Alexa, ask Phyn Device for my water status.” If you have a Phyn Plus, you can also control the shut off valve by saying “Alexa, tell Phyn Device to shut off my water.”
